animated.description: A flag indicating if the stripes of the progress bar should be animated. Defaults to false.

height.description: Height of the progress bar. Can take values in px, em, rem.

max.description: Maximum value of the progressbar. Defaults to 100.

showValue.description: A flag indicating if the current value should be displayed within the progressbar. Defaults to false.

striped.description: A flag indicating if the progress bar should be striped. Defaults to false.

type.description: Type of progress bar. Takes the values primary, success, info, warning & danger.

value.description: Current value of the progressbar. Should always be less or equal to max. Defaults to 0.
